**As a** [role]
**I need** [feature]
**So that** [benefit]

### Assumptions and Details
* [Document what you assume and what you know]

### Acceptance Criteria

```Gherkin
Given [some scenario]
When [the role performs an action]
Then [expected output or result]
```
